title: The Unexpected Hero: Alice Foster’s Journey
summary: Alice Foster, a 73-year-old tutoring enthusiast, discovers her ability to manipulate time during a week that changes her life and her community forever.
summaryGerman: Alice Foster, eine 73-jährige Tutoring-Enthusiastin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, in einer Woche, die ihr Leben und ihre Gemeinschaft für immer verändert.
summaryDutch: Alice Foster, een 73-jarige enthousiaste tutor, ontdekt haar vermogen om de tijd te manipuleren tijdens een week die haar leven en haar gemeenschap voor altijd verandert.
summaryFrench: Alice Foster, une passionnée de tutorat de 73 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps pendant une semaine qui change sa vie et sa communauté pour toujours.

story.text: Alice Foster, while tutoring at the local community center, suddenly stops an impending accident with a strange burst of speed, unknowingly manipulating time.
Confused but curious about her newfound abilities, Alice experiments and finds she can indeed slow down time, using it to help an injured bird recover quicker.
Feeling more confident, Alice uses her powers to avert a series of small accidents around town, becoming the talk of the local news.
Her daily life becomes a whirlwind of heroics as Alice, now nicknamed 'The Time Tutor', juggles her tutoring schedule with her secret life.
Alice meets a mysterious figure who shares similar powers and learns about a hidden society of time manipulators.
Together with her new mentor, Alice rescues a group of kids trapped in a time freeze at a local fair.
Reflecting on her week, Alice decides to use her abilities to subtly influence and improve her community while continuing her passion for teaching.

ending: And so, Alice Foster lived not just as a tutor, but as a timeless hero in the hearts of those she helped.
moral: Even the ordinary can be extraordinary in the right moments.
